home.yo-soy:
Specialist in web development with modern technologies, I build efficient and functional
digital solutions.

About.descripcion: Hello! I'm Guillermo Depetris, I'm 22 years old and I graduated from the Universidad Tecnológica Nacional (UTN), where I studied the Programming Technician's Degree. I stand out for my ability to lead projects, work in a team, learn new technologies quickly and develop solutions that meet the client's needs. Outside of coding, I enjoy exploring new tools and methodologies that allow me to grow both professionally and personally.
